nodes.text: The Statue of Xim was a large metal and stone sculpture of the tyrant Xim the Despot on the planet of Desevro. It originally stood one hundred meters high and contained treasure chambers that had protective traps to fend off looters. During the end of Xim's reign, it was toppled by a groundquake. Nevertheless, it was included in the list of the Twenty Wonders of the Galaxy by the historian Vicendi in his 10,000 BBY publication Arturum Galactinum.
